segments.text: I spot the faucet running full blast in that sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's focused on her plate, towel in hand, ignoring it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling over the edge, down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle; slippery floor ahead.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turning to the side, I see the boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies, but that thing's about to tip!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, excited for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being sneaky while mom's not looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a pretty garden; nice view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, hazards everywhereâ€”water, wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she notices before someone slips or falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes stacked nearby could topple too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a scene; ordinary day turning chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets frame the boy's stretch perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR
